WTF! Every time I try to update or run the game My Anti Virus Keeps Poping up a Virus Message Saying that it found a trojan!
Is this really a virus or is it just my Anti Virus Picking up weird code like how most AVs think keygens are a virus

Yah, that virus thing is annoying, for whatever reason-the new version of the online.exe file is recognized as a virus.  Some prick submitted it as a virus to McAfee, and so now every other AV program says that it is a trojan.  Just turn off your AV program while it updates, then run the game, than you can turn your AV back on and it shouldnt do it again.

I can vouch that the virus alert is a false positive.  I did some searching around and it looks like avast is just taking their sweet time decriminalizing it.  I'm running it now and everything works great.  Only problem is that there appears to be a custom OGG set, which isn't bad if you like Castlevania: Symphony of the Night music.

@yamaruxninja, no, there is no offline mode available with blue burst...for that you have to download PSO PC Version 2.  And yes, you can make a shortcut to online.exe and play it from there.

also @eightbithero, what custom OGG pack are you talking about?  I thought that I uploaded just my regular install folder!
